sect1.title: Dojo View Helpers
sect1.para: Zend Framework provides the following Dojo-specific view helpers:

listitem.para: dojo(): setup the Dojo environment for your page, including dojo configuration values, custom module paths, module require statements, theme stylesheets, CDN usage, and more.

example.title: Using Dojo View Helpers
example.para: To use Dojo view helpers, you will need to tell your view object where to find them. You can do this by calling addHelperPath():
